topics.body:
I was reading a manga called Boku No Hero Academia.

It's a story about a kid who has no powers in a world where 80% of the population has powers. He dreams to become a hero but due to his lack of powers, it also crushed his confidence.

He then receives the power of the world's strongest hero and and joins a school of heroes. The world's strongest hero gave him that power due to his pure and brave heart, and also the fact that he had been slowly dying for 5 years already.
